descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Lonzo Ball throws the long range lob to Patrick Williams, who calmly lays it in.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lonzo's court vision on point as he finds Williams) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lonzo's court vision on point as he finds Williams

videos.description: Nikola Vucevic thinks he has the open layup, but Jerami Grant comes over and swats it out of the air.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Grant rises for block on Vucevic) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Grant rises for block on Vucevic

videos.description: Zach LaVine knocks down the step-back 3, getting the Bulls' announcers fired up.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bulls announcers fired up after LaVine step back) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bulls announcers fired up after LaVine step back

videos.description: Zach LaVine goes down the lane and shows off the athleticism as he double-clutches in the air for the dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaVine double clutches in air for the slam) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaVine double clutches in air for the slam

videos.description: Jerami Grant finds a cutting Kelly Olynyk for the two-handed flush.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Grant dishes it to Olynyk for the jam) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Grant dishes it to Olynyk for the jam

videos.description: Hamidou Diallo with the and-1 bucket

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Hamidou Diallo with the and-1 bucket) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hamidou Diallo with the and-1 bucket

videos.description: Zach LaVine somehow gets the and-1 to go with his off hand and not looking at the basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaVine flips in left-handed and-1 without looking at the basket) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaVine flips in left-handed and-1 without looking at the basket

videos.description: Check out this sweet pass from Josh Jackson

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Check out this sweet pass from Josh Jackson) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Check out this sweet pass from Josh Jackson

videos.description: Ayo Dosunmu thinks he's got a layup but Josh Jackson swats it of the backboard.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jackson pins Dosunmu's layup on the backboard) 2021/10/20 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jackson pins Dosunmu's layup on the backboard

videos.description: Zach LaVine lifts the Bulls to the win over the Pistons, dropping 34 points.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (LaVine goes for 34 in Bulls’ opening night win) 2021/10/20 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: LaVine goes for 34 in Bulls' opening night win
